{"id":1582585743,"question_id":2665,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1742670638,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"79 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1582585743/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Time to Repair Cars","memory":"59.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    template<class T>\n    T firstTrue(T l, T r, function<bool(T)> f) {\n        r++;\n        while (l < r) {\n            T mid = l + (r - l) / 2;\n            if (f(mid)) r = mid;\n            else l = mid + 1;\n        }\n        return l;\n    }\n\n    long long repairCars(vector<int>& ranks, int cars) {\n        int N = (int)ranks.size();\n        return firstTrue<long long> (0, 1e18, [&](long long m) {\n            long long c = 0;\n            for (int i=0; i<N; i++) \n                c += sqrt(m*1.0/ranks[i]);\n            return c >= cars;\n        });\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-time-to-repair-cars","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1071}
